title: Poppies "SteadFast Presence" BUG
body:
There is a bug with Poppy's ability "Steadfast Presence", it did not correctly disrupt Quinn's ability "Vault".

I was playing poppy jungle, and was ganking a top lane quinn,
I did not use my stun on her just got close to her and stuck next to her thinking that if she tried to "vault" away i would be able to knock her up using "Steadfast Presence".

"Steadfast Presence" didn't work, Quinn "vaulted" away and my faith in poppy was crushed. haha

Please Fix Rito,
Thanks {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
https://youtu.be/u3JOjNR-eFE?t=43s

It should definitely stop it.

Not as bad as when you're chasing someone and you click E then right click so pre-start melee forming them and she goes to buckler so you have to press E again then you go to pre-start autoing by right clicking them so she goes to buckler again so you click E again then go to pre-fire autos and she goes to buckler again so u stand on the spot spinning rapidly because your E cast attempt is cancelling your buckler then your right click is trying to throw buckler and cancelling E cast. The joys of smartcasting.

It's not really a bug but its really annoying when you're trying to clutch land an E then auto-attack target so if someone jumps in you dont lose aggro (a-click) and you're microscopically out of range so she goes to throw buckler so you have to input E again and then just end up standing there repeatedly trying to throw buckler and cancelling it with E-on target then cancelling your E by trying to throw buckler and 4 seconds later you feel like a retard but it happens all the time.
